_info.title: Circuit Playground
_info.description: Jump into the world of Circuit Playground learn all about the amazing things that make circuits tick - and beep, and blink, and more! Travel along with Adabot, a curious robot who loves to learn, and discover new things about electronics in every episode. See electrons move, capacitors charge, and resistors resist - all from A to Z!
_info.itunesSubtitle: Jump into the world of Circuit Playground learn all about the amazing things that make circuits tick.
